dashboard.description:
# Microsoft G Suite: Health This pack gives a view of all systems across Production to help you get a status of the landscape.
# Adoption by Service
**Docs Interaction Time** - This shows the interaction time on average of people using the Productivity tools (Docs, Sheets etc) with the top users listed underneath, who are potential candidates for interview as they are heavily using the services. It may be worth speaking to these users to find out their experience of G Suite as they can provide good feedback.
**Email Interaction Time** This shows the interaction time on average of people using the Gmail service with the top users listed underneath, who are potential candidates for interview as they are heavily using the services. It may be worth speaking to these users to find out their experience of G Suite as they can provide good feedback.
**Sites Interaction Time** This shows the interaction time on average of people using the Sites service with the top users listed underneath, who are potential candidates for interview as they are heavily using the services. It may be worth speaking to these users to find out their experience of G Suite as they can provide good feedback.
**Chat Interaction Time** This shows the interaction time on average of people using the Chat service with the top users listed underneath, who are potential candidates for interview as they are heavily using the services. It may be worth speaking to these users to find out their experience of G Suite as they can provide good feedback.
::: configuration **No configuration is needed for this dashboard.**
dashboard.name: Adoption by Service

dashboard.description:
# Microsoft GSuite: Health This pack gives a view of all systems across Production to help you get a status of the landscape.
# Google Chrome
**Deployment** - This shows how many devices are running Chrome and what percentage of the total systems that is.
**Versions Deployed** - This indicates the number of *different* version of Drive File Stream deployed and this is broken down by to actual values on the right. GSuite should retain to current or current minus one version so follow up any below this. Note that this also separates the x32 and x64 versions so there is a possibility two entries with the same version may appear, the file size indicator is an additional indicator of differing versions.
**Stability** - This area shows any crashes of Google Chrome. Use the number of crashes to see any immediate problems or potential issues if the clients or the service is experiencing difficulty. Underneath this are the top devices so you can proactively contact these users to correct their systems.
**Freezes** -This area shows any freezing of Google Chrome. Use the number of freeze to see any immediate problems or potential issues if the clients or the service is experiencing difficulty. Underneath this are the top devices so you can proactively contact these users to correct their systems.
**Failed Web Requests** - This area shows any Failed Web Requests of Google Chrome. Use these KPI's to see any immediate problems or potential issues if the clients or the service is experiencing difficulty.
::: configuration **No configuration is needed for this dashboard as is** Note: This dashboard can be extended for Customers licensed for Nexthink Act.
**Please contact Nexthink Professional Services if needed.**
dashboard.name: Chrome

metric.label: GSuite - Google Chrome - Top 10 Application Crashes
GSuite - Google Chrome - Top 10 Application Freezes

dashboard.description:
# Microsoft GSuite: Health This pack gives a view of all systems across Production to help you get a status of the landscape.
# Google Drive File Stream
**Deployment** - This shows how many devices are running Google Drive File Stream and what percentage of the total systems that is.
**Versions Deployed** - This indicates the number of *different* version of Drive File Stream deployed and this is broken down by to actual values on the right. GSuite should retain to current or current minus one version so follow up any below this. Note that this also seperates the x32 and x64 versions so there is a possibility two entries with the same version may appear, the file size indicator is an additional indicator of differing versions.
**Stability** - This area shows any crashes of Google Drive File Stream. Use the number of crashes to see any immediate problems or potential issues if the clients or the service is experiencing difficulty. Underneath this are the top devices so you can proactively contact these users to correct their systems.
**Freezes** - This area shows any freezing of Google Drive File Stream. Use the number of freeze to see any immediate problems or potential issues if the clients or the service is experiencing difficulty. Underneath this are the top devices so you can proactively contact these users to correct their systems.
**Failed Web Requests** - This area shows any Failed Web Requests of Google Drive File Stream. Use these KPI's to see any immediate problems or potential issues if the clients or the service is experiencing difficulty.
::: configuration **No configuration is needed for this dashboard as is** Note: This dashboard can be extended for Customers licensed for Nexthink Act.
**Please contact Nexthink Professional Services if needed.**
dashboard.name: Google Drive File Stream

metric.label: GSuite - Google Drive File Stream - Top 10 Application Freezes

kpiConfig.title: Drive File Stream - Failed web requests

dashboard.description:
# Microsoft GSuite: Health This pack gives a view of all systems across Production to help you get a status of the landscape.
# Performance
**CPU** - This shows systems that have got high CPU usage for the Google Chrome process which should be investigated, the top systems are listed along with the regional breakdown.
**Memory** - This shows systems that have got high memory for Google Chrome which should be investigated, the top systems are listed along with the regional breakdown.
**Network Response Time** - This shows systems that a high network response time for the GSuite URL's which should be investigated, the top systems are listed along with the regional breakdown. Slow network response times should be investigated as to whether this is a Google issue or an internal one.
::: configuration **No configuration is needed for this dashboard**
dashboard.name: Performance

metric.label: GSuite - Top 20 devices with high CPU usage ratio - Production
GSuite - Performance - CPU Usage Above 10% - Production
GSuite - Top 20 devices with high memory usage - Production
Devices with high network response time
GSuite - Performance - High Network Response Time - Production

dashboard.description:
# Microsoft G Suite: Health This pack gives a view of all systems across Production to help you get a status of the landscape.
# Traffic Breakdown
**Web Traffic Averages** - This shows the trend of web traffic (averaged) per day, which should be predictable. Should this drop or increase significantly then an overall investigation should take place as to what may be causing this.
**Traffic Breakdowns** - The two Top 10 tables here indicate your top services in terms of G Suite traffic, which will provide insight into how much the service is consuming, per workload, on the network.
**Audio/Video - Top Users** - This Top 10 tables are showing the top traffic of Audio and Video traffic for each user. The top users here are good candidates for technology champions or evangelists within your organization as they are heavy users of the services.
::: configuration **No configuration is needed for this dashboard**
dashboard.name: Traffic Breakdown

tableConfig.title: Audio / Video Top Users - Total Traffic
